'''v0.16.0 alpha build 5'''<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15713</ref> (labelled '''0.15.90.8''' internally and '''v0.15.90.1 alpha build 1''' in-game) is the fifth and final build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.16.0 alpha|v0.16.0]], also known as the [[Boss Update]]. This is the final build released in 2016.

== Additions ==
* New command: {{cmd|enchant}}
* Added sounds for [[stray]]s, [[husk]]s and [[minecart]]s.
* Added [[texture]] packs from [[Pocket Edition v0.15.7 alpha|v0.15.7]] and [[Pocket Edition v0.15.8 alpha|v0.15.8]] versions.
* Added MineCon [[skin pack]] from [[Pocket Edition v0.15.9 alpha|v0.15.9]].
* Added [[elder guardian]] [[spawn egg]] to the [[creative]] [[inventory]].
** Added a [[texture]] for the [[elder guardian]] [[spawn egg]] to be shown instead of an empty [[spawn egg]].
* Added a new button when the [[player]] sneaks when a [[villager]] is highlighted.

== Changes ==
* Add-ons are now named Behavior Packs.
* Some icons for settings are now colored.
* Re-added [[Old]] world type which was removed in build 1
* A [[chest]] generates in big houses of [[cold taiga]] and [[ice plains]] [[village]]s.
